Clearing that up: I control one Vok being, which can't directly interfere in the war. The best it can do is cause Zardus mucho pain to have him do its biddings. rAuq's Ikoto are similar, though I don't think they're as cruel.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> I don't believe that there are anymore races more powerful than the 
> Vok. There are, however, the Ikoto who are a Vok faction, most 
> likely equal in power. Yan controls the Vok, and I control the Ikoto. 
> Though the never do anything. Nothing that affects anything directly 
> in the rpg, other than Pacifix's thoughts every so often. =)
> 
> 
> On 20 Jul 2001, at 2:29, dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> 
> >  O.k. I don't know. This is all I know. Somepeople say there was a
> > time mankind was as or more advanced than we are now until some kind
> > of disaster. What if the same thing happened on cybertron. There is
> > already evidense the organics didn't survive period.
